featured.text: If you put a ______ under a leaking faucet, you will be surprised at the amount of water collected in 24 hours.

definition.zh_def: 水龍頭；供水的裝置，通常安裝在水槽或浴缸上。
definition.en_def: A device for controlling the flow of liquid, typically water, from a pipe.
definition.example: I turned on the faucet to wash my hands.
